body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Vincent Henderson and the customer's name is Nancy White.  The conversation is about MetaCar (a Car Rental Agency ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Vincent Henderson, and I am with MetaCar, your go-to car rental agency.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Nancy! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I had some issues with my recent car rental.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that you're having trouble. If you don't mind, could you please provide me with your booking reference number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Nancy! And could you also provide me with your email address so I can look up your account?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it! Thank you for that information. I'm checking your account now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Nancy! Thank you for your time, and I hope to resolve this quickly for you.
